overview_of_class: A comparative overview of the classification and analysis of the major features and structures found across languages of the world. Rather than providing a broad survey of a wide range of issues, the course will present more extended case studies of a few issues. This quarter the course will be concerned with issues involving phrase structure, word order, case systems, and patterns of relativization such as head-external and head-internal relative clauses.
name: Language Typology
subject: LING
